original_title: SLPP MP attends UNP May Day rally in Colombo
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna (SLPP) Parliamentarian Dr. Gayashan Nawananda has reportedly joined the May Day rally of the United National Party (UNP) in Colombo.
The UNP’s May Day rally is currently underway at the P.D. Sirisena Ground in Maligawatte under the patronage of party leader President Ranil Wickremesinghe.
